dcterms:creator: R. Li
S. Yang
D. A. Ross
A. Kanazawa
dcterms:description: The AIST++ dataset includes 1,408 high-quality dance movements synchronized with music from 10 genres. It comprises motion sequences of varying durations, ranging from 7 seconds to 50 seconds, with an average duration of 13 seconds.
dcterms:title: AIST++ dataset
